empty_evidence_analysis.rationale: BoT exploration was purely analytical/theoretical - no external evidence gathered
empty_evidence_analysis.impact_on_confidence: Confidence should be lower due to lack of validation
empty_evidence_analysis.recommendation: Target pattern should gather evidence early

target_starting_confidence.rationale: No evidence to validate approaches - lower starting confidence

validation_result.reason: Empty evidence is valid for design/theoretical problems

validation_result.suggested_action: ToT should validate approaches against real constraints before deep exploration
